name: Color Coded (CipherSharpDev)
description:
Made in 6 days for One Minute Jam

Theme: Colorful

You wake up in a strange facility, you must match all of the colored blocks with the correct colored pressure pads to open the door to progress to the next room. Fail to match all of the blocks with pressure pads and you lose, and must restart from the beginning. 

Game Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Move Blocks: Click and Drag

I hope you enjoy the game!
